ygData.subject: RE: Mage Focus Items
ygData.msgSnippet: I too have done some of the focus items quest, The Shovel of Ponz and the Torch of Alna. The best source for information on these that I would suggest are...
ygData.messageBody:
I too have done some of the focus items quest, The Shovel of Ponz and the Torch of Alna. The best source for information on these that I would suggest are...
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/
and
http://www.geocities.com/eqsummoners/

These hold the correct info for all the focus items


Good luck!


^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Steven R. Hulse
